unnormalised: Arre yaar, my uncle Rakesh from Gurgaon got totally scammed last week. He clicked on some link in a WhatsApp forward about free data from Jio. Next thing you know, his bank account was emptied! He lost like Rs. 50,000! The cyber police told him it's a phishing scam and these things are happening all the time. They said he should have had 2FA enabled on his account and never click on unknown links. Now he’s all stressed and keeps saying “kya zamana aa gaya hai!” He’s filing a FIR today, hope he gets some of his money back.
normalised: Arre yaar, my uncle Rakesh from Gurgaon got totally scammed last week. He clicked on some link in a WhatsApp forward about free data from Jio. Next thing you know, his bank account was emptied! He lost like rupee fifty thousand! The cyber police told him it's a phishing scam and these things are happening all the time. They said he should have had two F-A enabled on his account and never click on unknown links. Now he’s all stressed and keeps saying “kya zamana aa gaya hai!” He’s filing a F-I-R today, hope he gets some of his money back.
